content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.1 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.1 Set up LDAP synchronization Set up AD filters Import users from AD Set up LDAP authentication FAQ
markdown:
This is documentation for Creatio **8.1**.

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/category/synchronize-users-with-ldap)** (8.3).
